info.description: Use these API to manage Azure Relay resources through Azure Resources Manager.
info.title: Relay API

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available Relay REST API operations.

post.description: Check the give namespace name availability.

requestBody.description: Parameters to check availability of the given namespace name

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the available namespaces within the subscription irrespective of the resourceGroups.

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the available namespaces within the ResourceGroup.

202.description: Namespace delete request has been accepted for processing and the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: Namespace delete request has been accepted, but the Namespace not found

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes an existing namespace. This operation also removes all associated resources under the namespace.

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the description for the specified namespace.

patch.description: Creates or updates a namespace. Once created, this namespace's resource manifest is immutable. This operation is idempotent.

requestBody.description: Parameters for updating a namespace resource.

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to create a Namespace Resource.

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.
Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request to delete Namespace Authorization rule succeeded.

204.description: No Content. The request has been accepted but the Namespace Authorization rule was not found.

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Request to create Namespace Authorization rule succeeded

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Primary and Secondary ConnectionStrings to the namespace

default.description: Relay error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Regenerates the Primary or Secondary ConnectionStrings to the namespace

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate Auth Rule.

200.description: Request to retrieve HybridConnections by NameSpace succeeded

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate Auth Rule.

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

resourceGroupNameParameter.description: Name of the Resource group within the Azure subscription.
resourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName

RegenerateKeysParameters.description: Parameters supplied to regenerate Auth Rule.

keyName.description: A string that describes the authorization rule

primaryConnectionString.description: PrimaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule.

primaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit primary key for signing and validating the SAS token

secondaryConnectionString.description: SecondaryConnectionString of the created Namespace AuthorizationRule

secondaryKey.description: A base64-encoded 256-bit secondary key for signing and validating the SAS token

AuthorizationRuleListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of AuthorizationRules

value.description: Result of the List AuthorizationRules operation.

rights.description: The rights associated with the rule.

CheckNameAvailability.description: Description of a Check Name availability request properties.

name.description: The Name to check the namespce name availability and The namespace name can contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens. The namespace must start with a letter, and it must end with a letter or number.

CheckNameAvailabilityResult.description: Description of a Check Name availability request properties.

message.description: The detailed info regarding the reason associated with the namespace.

nameAvailable.description: Value indicating namespace is availability, true if the namespace is available; otherwise, false.

reason.description: The reason for unavailability of a namespace.

ErrorResponse.description: Error reponse indicates Relay service is not able to process the incoming request. The reason is provided in the error message.

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

HybridConnectionListResult.description: The response of the List HybridConnection operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of HybridConnection operation

createdAt.description: The time the HybridConnection was created.

listenerCount.description: The number of listeners for this HybridConnection. min : 1 and max:25 supported

requiresClientAuthorization.description: true if client authorization is needed for this HybridConnection; otherwise, false.

updatedAt.description: The time the namespace was updated.

userMetadata.description: usermetadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data for the HybridConnection endpoint.e.g. it can be used to store  descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Invoice, etc.

OperationListResult.description: Result of the request to list EventHub operations. It contains a list of operations and a URL link to get the next set of results.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

value.description: List of EventHub operations supported by the Microsoft.EventHub resource provider.

RegenerateKeysParameters.description: Parameters supplied to the Regenerate Authorization Rule operation.

policyKey.description: Key that needs to be regenerated.

RelayNamespaceListResult.description: The response of the List Namespace operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of Namespaces

value.description: Result of the List Namespace operation.

createdAt.description: The time the namespace was created.

serviceBusEndpoint.description: Endpoint you can use to perform Service Bus operations.

updatedAt.description: The time the namespace was updated.

RelayNamespaceUpdateParameter.description: Parameters supplied to the Patch Namespace operation.

sku.description: The sku of the created namespace

tier.description: The tier of this particular SKU

UnavailableReason.description: Specifies the reason for the unavailability of the service.

createdAt.description: The time the WCFRelay was created.

isDynamic.description: true if the relay is dynamic; otherwise, false.

listenerCount.description: The number of listeners for this relay. min : 1 and max:25 supported

requiresClientAuthorization.description: true if client authorization is needed for this relay; otherwise, false.

requiresTransportSecurity.description: true if transport security is needed for this relay; otherwise, false.

updatedAt.description: The time the namespace was updated.

userMetadata.description: usermetadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data for the HybridConnection endpoint.e.g. it can be used to store  descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information also user-defined configuration settings can be stored.

WcfRelaysListResult.description: The response of the List WcfRelays operation.

nextLink.description: Link to the next set of results. Not empty if Value contains incomplete list of WcfRelays operation
